page.title: 13A CHILDS DAY (2) JULY 1985
page.content: After play we do reading, workshop or news. At 12.15 it is lunch. I hope it is sausages and chips and baked beans. After lunch we get half an hour playtime. In the afternoons we do music or topics or sports. I like sports afternoon best. I'm quite good at obstacle and long jump. I'm not very good at running or throwing. When we get back its playtime. That lasts until 2.45 p.m. After that we have a story. It is the Jungle Book. At 3.15 p.m we go home. There are 10 of us who go home on the coach. {A Bishop
